FuncDef: The upgrade application-software command upgrades the image software package in an open application system. The upgrade application-software command upgrades the image software package in an open application system.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the image software package to be upgraded.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Examples: Warning: The software package will be upgraded and the applications using the software package will be reset. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: You can run the upgrade application-software command to upgrade the image software package and update the application by replacing the software package.
